html:
B&H Photo has the well-specced Apple 14″ MacBook Pro (M3 Pro, Space Black) in their DealZone for $1999 (Reg $2799) today.

The system features the M3 Pro 12-core chip, 36GB of unified memory and a 1TV SSD, and quipped with Thunderbolt 4. This is a late 2023 model and should serve you well for years to come.

Apple 14″ MacBook Pro

  • Apple M3 Pro 12-Core Chip
  • 36GB Unified RAM | 1TB SSD
  • 14″ 3024 x 1964 Liquid Retina XDR Screen
  • 18-Core GPU | 16-Core Neural Engine
  • Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) | Bluetooth 5.3
  • Thunderbolt 4 | HDMI | MagSafe 3
  • SDXC Slot | FaceTime HD 1080p Camera
  • Backlit Magic Keyboard
  • Force Touch Trackpad | Touch ID Sensor
  • macOS

Apple 14″ MacBook Pro Overview

The system features the Apple M3 Pro 12-Core Chip, which provides the power and performance efficiency needed to handle all your professional workflows.

Now built on 3nm process technology, the M3 Pro 12-Core Chip is combined with the 18-Core GPU. The next-gen GPU features Dynamic Caching, hardware-accelerated ray tracing, and mesh shading, all of which significantly increase performance for the most demanding pro apps and games.

The 14.2″ Liquid Retina XDR display features a 3024 x 1964 resolution, 1000 nits of sustained brightness, 1600 nits of peak brightness, P3 color gamut support, and more.

With 36GB of unified RAM and 1TB of SSD storage, you’ll be able to load massive files and launch apps quickly, enabling you to work with photo and video libraries from almost anywhere.

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
